description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities:
Responsible for overall project management in Residential Landed Houses, planning & control, and execution, including project budget evaluation and profitability.
Administer all site works, including cashflow planning, costing, contract administration, management of delivery and progress of project to ensure quality of work and safety regulations are complied with.
Monitor the construction productivity, schedule, performance and investigate reasons for any unsatisfactory performance.
To provide recommendations and measures for improvement.
Obtain permits and licenses from appropriate authorities.
Evaluate progress and prepare detailed reports.
Maintain client's satisfaction with project performance and follow up on new business opportunities with the client.
Any other ad-hoc duties assigned by management of the company.
Job Requirements:
Recognized Diploma/Degree in Civil Engineering/Building/Construction Management or equivalent.
At least 5 years of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
Committed and responsible
Strong leadership and coaching skill
Able to take ownership

title: Project Management Officer (Bank) (JT) (SharePoint)
company_info: A-IT SOFTWARE SERVICES PTE LTD, established in 1991. Specialized in development outsourcing. Proven track record and continuous strong growth for more than 20 years. Headquartered in Singapore, with the regional office in Malaysia. Expertise in project management, system design & development for consumer banking, credit cards and loans. Highly proficient in delivering solutions on Vision Plus and Cardpac.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Duties & Responsibilities:
• Develops software solutions by studying requirements and working closely with stakeholders and Finance Team.
• Implementation of SharePoint-based workflows
• Design, develop and maintain key components of the software suite using classic ASP, Microsoft .Net, and SharePoint Server 2019.
• Ongoing support for applications, designing, and customizing SharePoint solutions.
• Planning and implementing software version upgrade releases, troubleshooting, and debugging SharePoint sites.
• Establish a UI design framework, Dashboards, Establish user journeys, mock-ups, or clickable prototypes.
• Deliver Monthly budgeting related activities like, monthly accrual and monthly forecast submission to ensure no overspending, completion, and adherence to standard and governance.
• Track monthly actual spending for projects to facilitate budget monitoring and submission of forecasting and accrual by Project Managers.
• Lodge and register contract and issues MCR and PO
• Track and submit required Finance posting for chargeback and reversal.
• Ensure Project Managers or Technical Leads obtain the DOA in accordance to standard and governance to allow contract lodgement and budget spend.
• Lodge and register contract and issues MCR and PO
• Monitor assignment of resources to projects and track their work allocation through Teams.
• Monitor and patch any recovery gap reported.
• Maintain headcount, forecast, actual, contract tracking.
Requirements:
• 4+ years of experience in advanced SharePoint layout, design, maintenance, site implementations, and controls

• 5 – 8 years in project management, project delivery or PMO
• UI/UX Experience with SharePoint Online, including creating custom forms, tools, or reports with Power Apps, and creating workflows with Power Automate.
• Experience using BCS to connect external data sources such as Access and Excel, with working knowledge of SQL queries and stored procedures to analyze data from multiple sources, including some understanding of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) techniques and processes.
• Strong knowledge of PMO analyst, finance processes, risk and project management standards
• High proficiency with Microsoft suite (Word, PowerPoint, Excel).
• Handle banking projects in the data analytics space in the pastis an added advantage.
• Advance financial & business analysis skills
• Has keen attention to details with excellent analytical skills.
• Team player with good communication skills
